```{python}
#| label: fig-basic-ota-small-signal-noise
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "5-transistor OTA small-signal model for noise calculation."
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
with sd.Drawing(canvas='svg') as d:
    d.config(unit=2)
    d.config(fontsize=16)

    elm.Ground()
    d.push()
    In1 = elm.SourceI().label('In1').reverse()
    elm.Line().length(2).dot()
    d.push()
    gm34 = elm.Resistor().up().label('gm34')
    elm.Vdd()
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().right().length(3)
    In3 = elm.SourceI().label('In3')
    elm.Vdd()

    d.pop()
    d.move(dx=7)
    elm.Ground()
    Ids2 = elm.SourceI().label('In2').reverse()
    elm.Line().up().length(1).dot()
    out = d.here
    elm.Line().up().length(1).dot()
    d.push()
    Ids4 = elm.SourceI().label('gm34 Vgs34')
    elm.Vdd()
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().right().length(3)
    In4 = elm.SourceI().label('In4')
    elm.Vdd()

    l1 = elm.Line().right().at(out).length(3).dot(open=True).label('Vout', 'right')
    elm.CurrentLabelInline(direction='in', ofst=-0.15).at(l1).label('In')
    
    elm.Line().left().length(3).at(gm34.start).dot(open=True)
    elm.Gap().up().label(['+', 'Vgs34', '-'])
    elm.Dot(open=True)
    elm.Vdd()
```
